name: Catch My Dog & Fight Them GO
name_original: Catch My Dog & Fight Them GO
description:
Catch Me Dog GO are out there, and you need to find them. As you walk around a neighborhood, your smartphone will vibrate when there’s a Dog hero nearby. Take aim and throw a Ball… You’ll have to stay alert, or it might get away!

As you level up, you’ll be able to fight & catch more-powerful Hero & Monster. You can add to your collection by hatching Eggs based on the distances you walk. Help your Hero & Monster evolve by catching many of the same kind.

Search far and wide for heroes collection and items
Visit found at interesting places like museums, art installations, historical markers, and monuments, to stock up on Balls and helpful items.

It’s time to get moving—your real-life adventures await!
